answerText: Jacobian matrix [or Jacobian determinant][10] The Jacobian is also used when changing variables while doing this. The fundamental theorem of calculus says that it is the opposite of differentiation.
heading: DEES |2014 | Editors 2 | 15 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The Implicit Function Theorem is satisfied when the determinant of this matrix is non-zero.  [10] Name this m by n matrix consisting of the partial derivatives of a function F from R n to R m.
